meanings.definition: Relating to or involving both electrical and mechanical processes.
meanings.sent1: The electromechanical toy car moved using both electricity and gears.
meanings.sent2: The factory upgraded to an electromechanical system for more efficient production.
meanings.sent3: The robot's electromechanical dance routine was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an electromechanical device, seamlessly switching between logic and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The electromechanical clock ticked with the precision of a heartbeat.

meanings.definition: A device or system that combines electrical and mechanical components.
meanings.sent1: The electromechanical in the lab was a fascinating blend of wires and gears.
meanings.sent2: The old elevator was replaced with a modern electromechanical one.
meanings.sent3: The electromechanical hum of the machine was oddly soothing.
meanings.sent4: His body felt like an electromechanical contraption, each part working in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The electromechanical device whirred to life, a symphony of technology and mechanics.
